title: A Most excellent ballad of an old man and his wife, vvho in their want and misery sought to their children for succour, by whom they were disdained, and scornfully sent away succourless, and Gods vengeance shewed on them for the same. : Tune of, Priscillca [sic].
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, I. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passenger.,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library (reel 2123) and the Bodleian Library (reel 2574).
